abilities.name: Amphibious Assault
abilities.effect: 1AP: Swim 6″ through water or mist.

abilities.name: Pack Tactics
abilities.effect: +1 to WS/BS within 3″ of another Murloc. (+7)

abilities.name: Primitive Cunning
abilities.effect: Free Dash once per Turning Point when within 6" of Murloc King.

abilities.name: Crab Shell Shield
abilities.effect: Improve Save by 1 (to 5+). When defending, retain one failed attack dice as a success.

abilities.name: Tidal Surge
abilities.effect: 1AP: Push 2" all enemies within 6″. (+7)

abilities.name: Primitive Cunning
abilities.effect: Free Dash once per Turning Point when within 6" of Murloc King.

abilities.name: King’s Command
abilities.effect: Re-roll attack dice with result of 1 for Murlocs within 6". (+7)

abilities.name: Tidal Surge
abilities.effect: 1AP: Push 2" all enemies within 6". (+7)

abilities.effect: 1AP: Fly 7″ over terrain.

abilities.effect: +1 Damage to successful Fight actions. (+7)

abilities.effect: 1AP: Fly 7″ over terrain.

abilities.name: Banner of Resilience
abilities.effect: Friendly operatives within 6″ reduce incoming damage by 1 (to a minimum of 1). (+7)

abilities.effect: 1AP: Fly 7″ over terrain.

abilities.name: Flute of Fury
abilities.effect: Friendly operatives within 6″ gain +1 to WS until the end of the Turning Point. (+7)

abilities.effect: 1AP: Fly 7″ over terrain.

abilities.name: Primal Strength
abilities.effect: +1 Damage to successful Fight actions. (+7)

abilities.name: Combat Medicae
abilities.effect: 1AP: Heal 2D3 +2 wounds to a friendly operative within 3″.

abilities.name: Genetic Augmentation
abilities.effect: 1AP: Friendly operative within 6″ +1 to WS until the end of apothecary next activation. Does not stack with other WS/BS modifiers. (+7)

abilities.name: Revitalizing Aura
abilities.effect: All friendly operatives within 3″ reduce incoming damage by 1 (to a minimum of 1). (+7)

abilities.name: Desperate Charge
abilities.effect: Can perform two dash actions if it doesn't perform any actions other than dash and reposition during this activation and it has the engage order.

abilities.name: Mistforged Precision
abilities.effect: Re-roll one attack roll in mist zones.

abilities.name: Lancer’s Charge
abilities.effect: 1AP: Free Charge + Fight action. (+7)

abilities.name: Inspiring Presence
abilities.effect: Friendly operatives within 6″ re-roll 1s on attack rolls. (+7)

abilities.name: Daemonic Flight
abilities.effect: Fly 8″ over terrain. (+7)

abilities.name: Warpfire Trail
abilities.effect: After moving, leave a 1″-wide trail of warpfire. Enemies crossing it suffer 1D3 wounds. (+7)

abilities.name: Daemonic Flight
abilities.effect: Fly 8″ over terrain. (+7)

abilities.name: Aegis of the Ninefold Deceit
abilities.effect: Reduces by 1 (to a min of 2) damage received by visible friendly operatives within 6". (+7)

abilities.name: Ethereal Form
abilities.effect: Remove this operative from the killzone at the end of the turning point.

abilities.name: Daemonic Flight
abilities.effect: Fly 8″ over terrain. (+7)

abilities.name: Arcane Bargain
abilities.effect: Once per activation an enemy within control range, roll 1d6 and that enemy suffers result wounds and restore result wounds from friendly operative that it's both visible and within 4", if an operative other than Summoner recovered wounds this way and Summoner is both visible and within 4" of this operative and that operative, restore result/2 wounds rounded up from Summoner. (+7)

abilities.name: Ethereal Form
abilities.effect: Remove this operative from the killzone at the end of the turning point.

abilities.name: Mark of Khorne
abilities.effect: Re-roll one attack die per activation in melee. (+7)

abilities.name: Warp-fueled Rage
abilities.effect: After defeating an enemy, gain +1 Attack next activation. (+7)

abilities.name: Dark Zeal
abilities.effect: Re-roll one attack or defense die per activation. (+7)

abilities.name: Inspiring Terror
abilities.effect: Enemy operatives within 6″ worsen their WS by 1. (+7)

abilities.name: Psychic Dominion
abilities.effect: 1AP: Cast Smite (10″ range, 1D3 mortal wounds) or Warpfire (create a 3″ hazardous terrain patch within 6" and visible). (+7)

abilities.name: Warpfire
abilities.effect: Enemies in or moving through Warpfire suffer 1D3 wounds. (+7)

abilities.name: Malicious Volleys
abilities.effect: If stationary, shoot twice with the same weapon. (+7)

abilities.name: Overcharge
abilities.effect: 1AP: +1 Damage to next attack, but suffer 1 wound on a hit roll of 1.

abilities.name: Mist Resilience
abilities.effect: In mist zones, gain Cover against ranged attacks.

abilities.effect: 1AP: Push all enemies within 6″ by 2″. (+7)

abilities.effect: Friendly operatives within 6″ re-roll 1s on attack rolls. (+7)

abilities.name: Markerlight
